    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(int code,
               java.lang.String imagePath,
               java.lang.String savePath,
               java.lang.String savePathOverlapped)
        Builds a default request.
        Parameters:
        code - default code
        imagePath - image to filter
        savePath - save path
        savePathOverlapped - save path for the overlapped image

      • Request

        public Request(int code,
               java.lang.String imagePath,
               java.lang.String savePath,
               java.lang.String savePathOverlapped,
               int detectLinesOrNot,
               double denoiseWeigh,
               int kernel,
               double minAngle,
               double maxAngle,
               int minLineLength,
               int lineGap,
               int smallObjectLenght)
        Builds an advance request for python server.
        Parameters:
        code - advanced code
        imagePath - image to filter
        savePath - save path
        savePathOverlapped - save path for the overlapped image
        detectLinesOrNot - 1 or 0 if the user wants line detection
        denoiseWeigh - denoise force parameter
        kernel - kernel id to use
        minAngle - minimum angle for lines detection
        maxAngle - maximum angle for lines detection
        minLineLength - minimum line length accepted for detect lines
        lineGap - maximum gap between pixel in the image to form a line
        smallObjectLenght - maximum length for removing an object in the image

      • Request

        public Request(int code,
               java.lang.String closeString)
        Builds a request for closing the python server.
        Parameters:
        code - close server code
        closeString - close server string
